update si_forklift
forklift_no = #{forkliftNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
forklift_model = #{forkliftModel,jdbcType=CHAR},

update si_forklift set forklift_no = #{forkliftNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, forklift_model = #{forkliftModel,jdbcType=CHAR}, forklift_brand = #{forkliftBrand,jdbcType=CHAR}, supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, contact = #{contact,jdbcType=CHAR}, contact_phone = #{contactPhone,jdbcType=CHAR}, imei_no = #{imeiNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, work_area = #{workArea,jdbcType=TINYINT}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, extra = #{extra,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dr = #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT} where forklift_id = #{forkliftId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.sql: f.forklift_id, f.forklift_no, f.forklift_model, f.forklift_brand, s.supplier_name, f.imei_no, f.work_area, f.`status`
mapper.select:
select
from si_forklift f left join si_supplier s on f.supplier_id = s.supplier_id where f.dr = 1
and f.work_area = #{wid,jdbcType=TINYINT}
and f.`status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}
and f.forklift_no like concat('%',#{fno,jdbcType=CHAR},'%')
and f.forklift_model like concat('%',#{fmodel,jdbcType=CHAR},'%')
order by f.create_time desc

select
from si_forklift where imei_no = #{imeiNo,jdbcType=CHAR} and dr = 1 limit 1
